title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding.
description: Localization key cannot be blank when adding. Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When attempting to add a localization key without any value, the system allows the key to be added successfully but fails to display the externalized text in the chart.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even when the localization key is left blank.
SR:
1. Navigate to the localization key management page.
2. Leave the key field blank while adding a new localization key.
3. Save the localization key.
4. Verify that the externalized text is displayed correctly in the chart title.
